name: Count Dooku
subtitle: Darth Tyranus
text: After you activate this character, you may turn one of his character dice to a side showing melee damage ([melee]). Turn an opponent's die showing melee damage ([melee]) to any side.
flavor: "I sense great fear in you."
label: Count Dooku - Darth Tyranus

name: Fifth Brother
subtitle: Intimidating Enforcer
text: [special] - Resolve one of your non-ability Blue upgrade dice without removing it from your pool.
flavor: "The kill is mine!"
label: Fifth Brother - Intimidating Enforcer

name: Force Sensitive Outcast
text: While this character has 1 or more damage on her, decrease the cost of the first Blue ability you play on her each round by 1.
label: Force Sensitive Outcast

name: Snoke
subtitle: Supreme Leader
text: Power Action - Deal 1 damage to another one of your characters to resolve one of its character dice showing damage, increasing its value by 2.
flavor: "There has been an awakening. Have you felt it?"
label: Snoke - Supreme Leader

name: Crush Hope
text:
Play only if an opponent has one or more dice showing a blank ([blank]).
Discard any number of cards from your hand to deal that much indirect damage ([indirect]) to that opponent.
label: Crush Hope

name: Dark Ritual
text: Return one of your defeated characters to the game exhausted and place damage on it equal to half of its health, rounded down.
label: Dark Ritual

name: Lack of Faith
text: Spot a Blue character that is 15 or more points to remove all of a character's character dice.
label: Lack of Faith

name: No Escape
text:
Play only if an opponent has no cards in their hand.
Deal 2 damage to one of that opponent's characters.
label: No Escape

name: Power From Pain
text: Spot 2 Blue characters or Snoke to deal 1 damage to one of your characters. Then turn one of that character's character or upgrade dice to any side.
label: Power From Pain

name: Triple Threat
text: Reroll 3 character dice. Then turn one of them to any side.
label: Triple Threat

name: Undermine
text: Remove up to 2 dice showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Undermine

name: Dark Empowerment
text: Action - Exhaust this support and remove one of your dice showing a blank ([blank]) to deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
label: Dark Empowerment

name: Count Dooku's Solar Sailer
text: After you activate this support, you may draw a card.
label: Count Dooku's Solar Sailer

name: Bardottan Sphere
text: [special] - Discard the top card of deck. If that card's cost is an odd number, deal 1 damage to a character.
flavor: "I can feel the power of the pure spirit resonating in this orb." <cite>Mother Talzin</cite>
label: Bardottan Sphere

name: Fifth Brother's Lightsaber
text:
While this upgrade is on Fifth Brother, you can resolve this die showing a modifier as if it were not a modifier.
After you resolve this die, you may deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Fifth Brother's Lightsaber

name: Force Fear
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Remove an opponent's character die unless they deal 2 damage to that character.
label: Force Fear

name: Torment
text: After attached character is dealt damage, you may exhaust this upgrade to gain 1 resource.
flavor: "I'm being torn apart. I want to be free of this pain." <cite>Kylo Ren</cite>
label: Torment

name: Arihnda Pryce
subtitle: Unscrupulous Governor
text: [special] - Turn another of your dice to any side. If you control the battlefield, you may resolve that die, increasing its value by 1.
flavor: "They flight so hard to gain so little."
label: Arihnda Pryce - Unscrupulous Governor

name: Executioner
text: After an opponent's character is defeated, you may roll this die into your pool.
label: Executioner

name: Firmus Piett
subtitle: Ambitious Admiral
text: After you activate this character, turn any number of your vehicle and non-unique character dice to sides showing a value of 1.
flavor: "Intensify forward power!"
label: Firmus Piett - Ambitious Admiral

name: General Grievous
subtitle: Fearsome Cyborg
text: Ignore all play restrictions on weapons played on this character. He can have one additional upgrade. Power Action - If 4 of this character's weapon dice are in your pool, deal 4 damage to a character.
label: General Grievous - Fearsome Cyborg

name: Art of War
text: Spot a Red character to reveal an opponent's hand. For each card just revealed, remove a die showing a value that is equal to that card's cost.
label: Art of War

name: Furious Assault
text: Spot 2 Red characters or General Grievous to roll all weapon dice on one of your characters into your pool.
flavor: "How does it feel to die?" <cite>General Grievous</cite>
label: Furious Assault

name: Machine Replacement
text: Play an upgrade from your hand on a character. Then heal 1 damage from that character.
label: Machine Replacement

name: Opening Volley
text: Play only if this is the first action of this round (no player has taken an action). Deal 3 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
label: Opening Volley

name: Overrun
text:
Play only if you have more support dice in your pool than an opponent has characters in play.
Take control of the battlefield. You may use its claim ability.
label: Overrun

name: Testing Procedure
text: Activate up to 2 of your supports. Then, if any of those support dice just rolled damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), gain 1 resource.
label: Testing Procedure

name: Well-armed
text: Choose a weapon from your hand and play it, decreasing its cost by the number of weapons on one of your characters.
flavor: "I have been trained in your Jedi arts" <cite>General Grievous</cite>
label: Well-armed

name: Blockade
text: After setup, force an opponent to lose 1 resource.
label: Blockade

name: Climate Disruption Array
text: Action - Exhaust this support to deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to each player, starting with you.
label: Climate Disruption Array

name: General Grievous' Wheel Bike
text: Power Action - Spend 1 resource or spot General Grievous to ready this support.
flavor: "I'll enjoy crushing you!" <cite>General Grievous</cite>
label: General Grievous' Wheel Bike

name: Imperial Troop Transport
text: The X on this die is equal to the number of non-unique characters you have in play.
label: Imperial Troop Transport

name: Planetary Bombardment
text: Ambush. After you play this support, you may deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of vehicles you spot.
label: Planetary Bombardment

name: Executioner's Axe
text: After an opponent's character is defeated, you may roll this die into your pool.
label: Executioner's Axe

name: DJ
subtitle: Treacherous Rogue
text: After you remove one or more of an opponent's dice, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to that opponent for each die you just removed.
label: DJ - Treacherous Rogue

name: Jabba The Hutt
subtitle: Renowned Gangster
text: [special] - Deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of your dice showing a special ([special]) (including this die).
flavor: "There will be no bargain."
label: Jabba The Hutt - Renowned Gangster

name: Mandalorian Super Commando
text: Power Action - Play an equipment or weapon from your hand on this character. Then deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Mandalorian Super Commando

name: Sebulba
subtitle: Cutthroat Podracer
text: [special] - Place 1 resource on a support in play or remove 1 resource from a support in play.
flavor: "You wan't walk away from this one, you slave scum!"
label: Sebulba - Cutthroat Podracer

name: By Any Means
text: Remove a die showing a value of 2 or more. Then deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself.
label: By Any Means

name: Cocky
text: Spot a Yellow character to have each player choose and discard 2 cards from their hand, starting with you.
label: Cocky

name: Extreme Hubris
text: Spot 2 Yellow characters or Jabba the Hutt to resolve one of your character dice without removing it from your pool.
label: Extreme Hubris

name: Nefarious Deed
text: Ambush. Move 1 damage from an opponent's card to another card in play (this ignores shields).
label: Nefarious Deed

name: Paid Off
text: Give an opponent 2 of your resources to resolve one of their character or upgrade dice as if it were your own.
label: Paid Off

name: Partners in Crime
text: Resolve any number of your dice showing a disrupt ([disrupt]) as if they where showing indirect damage ([indirect]), or vice versa.
label: Partners in Crime

name: Quarrel
text: Force an opponent to choose to either lose 1 resource or discard a card from their hand.
label: Quarrel

name: Rancorous
text:
Play only if you have one or more character dice showing a blank ([blank]).
Remove a die.
label: Rancorous

name: Sebulba Always Wins
text: Discard a support from play that has 1 or more tokens on it.
flavor: "You're Bantha fodder!" <cite>Sebulba</cite>
label: Sebulba Always Wins

name: Sticky Situation
text: Force an opponent to choose a die. Then remove a different die.
label: Sticky Situation

text: After you deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself, you may deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.
flavor: "I'm a protocol droid, specialized in etiquette, customs, translation and torture, ma'am."

name: Sebulba's Podracer
text:
Ambush.
After you resolve this die, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent or, if you spot Sebulba, deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Sebulba's Podracer

name: Formidable
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage to an opponent's character. If that damage was not blocked, you may move an equipment or weapon from that character to another one of that opponent's characters.
label: Formidable

name: Underhanded Tactics
text: [special] - Deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. You may resolve another one of your dice.
label: Underhanded Tactics

name: Way of the Dark
text: Choose one of your defeated character's dice and roll it into your pool. Set that die aside after it is resolved or removed.
flavor: "Peace is a lie. There is only passion." <cite>The Sith Code</cite>
label: Way of the Dark

name: Ezra Bridger
subtitle: Aspiring Jedi
text: Power Action - If this character has one or more upgrades, draw a card, or 2 cards instead if he has 3 or more upgrades.
flavor: "We can fight him together!"
label: Ezra Bridger - Aspiring Jedi

name: Jedi Sentinel
text:
After setup, give a character 1 shield.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if this character has 3 or more shields.
label: Jedi Sentinel

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Reluctant Instructor
text: You may resolve the shield ([shield]) sides of this die as if they were melee damage ([melee]). Power Action - Move a Blue ability from this character to another Blue character.
label: Luke Skywalker - Reluctant Instructor

name: Plo Koon
subtitle: Jedi Protector
text: This character has the abilities of each non-unique character you have in play.
flavor: "Not everything is what it seems."
label: Plo Koon - Jedi Protector

name: Fond Memories
text: Choose up to 3 cards in a player's discard pile and place them on the bottom of their deck in the order of your choice. Set this card aside.
label: Fond Memories

name: Loth-Wolf Bond
text: Give up to 2 of your Blue characters 1 shield each. You may activate those characters in the order of your choice.
label: Loth-Wolf Bond

name: Luke's Training
text: Spot 2 Blue characters or Luke Skywalker to play a Blue ability from your hand or discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Luke's Training

name: Pacify
text: Remove a character die. Then give that character 2 shields.
label: Pacify

name: Propel
text: Turn a character die to any side. Turn an upgrade die to any side. Turn a support die to any side.
label: Propel

name: Renewed Purpose
text: Spot a plot to draw 3 cards.
flavor: "A clear path if ever there was one." <cite>Plo Koon</cite>
label: Renewed Purpose

name: Steadfast
text: Move 1 damage from one of your Blue characters to another character, or 2 damage instead if no cards are in your discard pile (this ignores shields).
label: Steadfast

name: Plo Koon's Starfighter
text: After you activate this support, you may turn one of your non-unique character dice to any side. If you spot Plo Koon, you may resolve that die.
label: Plo Koon's Starfighter

name: A99 Aquata Breather
text: Before attached character takes indirect damage ([indirect]), you may exhaust this upgrade to block 1 of that damage.
label: A99 Aquata Breather

name: Ezra Bridger's Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to an opponent's character. If this upgrade is on Ezra Bridger, force that opponent to lose 1 resource.
label: Ezra Bridger's Lightsaber

name: Guardian of the Whills
text: Action - Exhaust this upgrade to move it to one of your characters. If that character is Blue, give it 1 shield. If it is Red, deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
label: Guardian of the Whills

name: Luke Skywalker's Lightning Rod
text: While this upgrade is attached to Luke Skywalker, you may resolve the melee damage ([melee]) sides of this die as if they were shields ([shield]).
label: Luke Skywalker's Lightning Rod

name: There Is No Try
text: Action - Reroll this die. Then you may resolve it, increasing its value by 1. Otherwise, remove it.
flavor: "Do. Or do not." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: There Is No Try

name: Boss Nass
subtitle: Bombastic Ruler
text: After you activate a Gungan, you may deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of its character dice that just rolled a blank ([blank]).
flavor: "Be gone with him!"
label: Boss Nass - Bombastic Ruler

name: Gungan Warrior
flavor: Though some regarded them as primitive, the amphibious Gungans were a technologically advanced species from the planet Naboo.
label: Gungan Warrior

name: Leia Organa
subtitle: Heart of the Resistance
text: Power Action - Remove one of your character dice to discard cards from the top of a deck equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Leia Organa - Heart of the Resistance

name: Rex
subtitle: Clone Captain
text: Before you activate this character, you may spend 1 resource or spot a Clone Trooper to take control of the battlefield.
flavor: "In my book, experience outranks everything."
label: Rex - Clone Captain

name: Blaze of Glory
text: Activate one of your characters. Then remove any number of an opponent's dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) and deal damage to that character equal to the combined value of the removed dice.
label: Blaze of Glory

name: Desperate Hour
text:
Play only if the combined remaining health of your characters is 3 or less.
Ready a character.
label: Desperate Hour

name: First Aid
text: Heal 2 damage from a Red character, or 4 damage instead if it is the first round of the game.
label: First Aid

name: Gungan Offensive
text: Turn up to 3 of your Gungan or artillery dice to sides showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).
label: Gungan Offensive

name: Motivate
text: Spot 2 Red characters or Leia Organa to resolve one of your character dice, increasing its value by 1.
label: Motivate

name: Reposition
text: Force an opponent to turn a die to any side. Then you turn a different die to any side.
label: Reposition

name: Long-Term Plan
text: Action - Exhaust this plot to place 1 resource on it or resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by the number of resources on this plot.
label: Long-Term Plan

name: Gungan Catapult
text: After you activate a Gungan, you may reroll this die.
label: Gungan Catapult

name: Resistance Crait Speeder
text: Before you resolve this die, if this support has no damage, you may place 1 damage on this support to increase its value by 1.
label: Resistance Crait Speeder

name: Suppressive Fire
text: After a character is activated, you may spend 1 resource and discard this support from play to remove one of its character dice.
label: Suppressive Fire

name: Electropole
text: Before attached character would be defeated, you may move this upgrade to a Gungan (return this die to this card).
label: Electropole

name: Inspiring Presence
text:
Unique character only.
Your other characters have the Guardian keyword.
label: Inspiring Presence

name: Rex's Blaster Pistol
text:
While this upgrade is on Rex, your copies of it are non-unique.
After you activate attached character, if you control the battlefield, you may activate one of your characters.
label: Rex's Blaster Pistol

name: Anakin Skywalker
subtitle: Podracing Prodigy
text: After you activate this character, you may turn one of your droid or podracer dice to any side.
flavor: "I've built a racer. It's the fastest ever!"
label: Anakin Skywalker - Podracing Prodigy

name: Bo-Katan Kryze
subtitle: Deathwatch Lieutenant
text:
You can include Yellow villain upgrades in your deck.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if this character has 1 or more villain upgrades.
flavor: "You ever use one of these before?"
label: Bo-Katan Kryze - Deathwatch Lieutenant

name: Cassian Andor
subtitle: Rebellion Operative
text: After you resolve this die, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent or discard the top card of a deck.
flavor: "I've been in this fight since I was six years old."
label: Cassian Andor - Rebellion Operative

name: Trusted Informant
text: After you activate this character, you may look at an opponent's hand.
label: Trusted Informant

name: Clandestine Operation
text: Spot 2 Yellow characters or Cassian Andor to resolve any number of your dice showing the same symbol. Then discard cards from the top of a deck equal to the number of dice you just resolved.
label: Clandestine Operation

name: Closing the Deal
text: Gain 5 resources. You must pass all of your future turns this round.
label: Closing the Deal

name: Defensive Racing
text: Play only if one or more of your vehicle dice were removed during an opponent's last turn this round. Spot a Yellow character to roll one of those removed dice into your pool.
label: Defensive Racing

name: Dumb Luck
text: Spot a Yellow character or a Gungan to reroll up to 5 of your dice. Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of dice that just rolled a blank ([blank]).
label: Dumb Luck

name: Mechanical Insight
text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck for a droid or podracer, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Place the rest on the bottom of your deck in the order of your choice.
label: Mechanical Insight

name: Narrow Escape
text:
Play only if you have no other cards in your hand.
Remove a die.
label: Narrow Escape

name: Rigged Detonation
text:
Play only if an opponent controls the battlefield.
Deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to that opponent equal to the number of resources they have, to a maximum of 5.
label: Rigged Detonation

name: Righteous Cause
text: Ambush. Move 1 damage from one of your cards to another one of your cards in play of the same type (this ignores shields).
label: Righteous Cause

name: Scoping the Target
text: If you have 5 or more different symbols showing on your dice, deal 2 damage to a character or, if you have 10 or more different symbols showing on your dice, defeat a character.
label: Scoping the Target

name: Shootout
text: Turn up to 3 of an opponent's dice to sides showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then turn an equal number of your dice to sides showing damage.
label: Shootout

name: Anakin Skywalker's Podracer
text:
Ambush.
After you resolve this die, you may discard the top card of a deck or, if you spot Anakin Skywalker, discard a random card from an opponent's hand.
label: Anakin Skywalker's Podracer

name: N-1 Starfighter
text: [special] - Ready or discard an exhausted vehicle that is not a copy of this support.
flavor: "The N-1 Starfighter represents the pinnacle in Naboo technology." <cite>Captain Quarsh Panaka</cite>
label: N-1 Starfighter

name: CR-2 Heavy Blaster
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 4 damage instead if an opponent has no dice in their pool.
label: CR-2 Heavy Blaster

name: Stealthy
text: Attached character has the trooper subtype. [special] - Discard cards from the top of a deck equal to the value showing on one of your character dice.
label: Stealthy

name: Way of the Light
text: Remove a non-hero die.
label: Way of the Light

name: Dex's Diner
text: Action - Exhaust this support and spend 1 resource to heal 1 damage from a character, or 2 damage instead if there is 6 or more damage on that character.
flavor: The best food this side of the Senate District!
label: Dex's Diner

name: Become One
text: Remove one of your Blue dice. Then resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by the value showing on the die you just removed.
label: Become One

name: Beguile
text: Reroll an opponent's die. Then turn one of their dice to any side. Then remove one of their dice.
label: Beguile

name: Control
text: Turn all dice to sides of your choice.
flavor: "I have brought peace, freedom, justice, and security to my new empire." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
label: Control

name: Division in the Force
text: Resolve one of your Blue dice. Then remove a die showing the same value as the die you just resolved.
label: Division in the Force

name: Flames of the Past
text: Discard a card from play if there is a copy of that card in any discard pile.
label: Flames of the Past

name: Peace and Quiet
text: Turn a die to a side showing a value of 0 <em>(blanks and specials have a value of 0)<em>.
label: Peace and Quiet

name: Turn the Tide
text: Move all shields from an opponent's character to one of your characters.
label: Turn the Tide

name: Built to Last
text:
Each of your unique upgrades has the Redeploy keyword.
After you play a unique upgrade, you may exhaust this plot to gain 1 resource.
label: Built to Last

name: Honed Skills
text: Each of your characters can have one additional upgrade.
label: Honed Skills

name: Dagger of Mortis
text:
Redeploy.
Before you resolve this die showing melee damage ([melee]), you may move 1 shield from a Blue character to attached character.
label: Dagger of Mortis

name: Force Jump
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Turn a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) to a side showing a blank ([blank]). Reroll this die instead of removing it.
label: Force Jump

name: Way of the Force
text: Play only if you spot a Blue character. Attached character is elite (place a second copy of its die on it).
label: Way of the Force

name: Change of Fate
text: Choose any number of dice. Force an opponent to turn each of those dice to sides of their choice.
label: Change of Fate

name: Glancing Shot
text: Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), decreasing its value by 1. Then remove a die.
label: Glancing Shot

name: Grand Entrance
text: Activate one of your characters. Reroll any number of its character and upgrade dice. Then reroll any number of its character and upgrade dice.
label: Grand Entrance

name: Hostile Takeover
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Choose a symbol showing on one of your dice. Then resolve an opponent's die showing that symbol as if it were your die.
label: Hostile Takeover

name: Overload
text: Place 1 damage on a support in play. Then you may discard that support if it has damage on it equal to or more than its cost.
label: Overload

name: Reconstruct
text: Add a support from your discard pile to your hand.
label: Reconstruct

name: Take the Fight to Them
text: Resolve any number of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) in the order of your choice.
label: Take the Fight to Them

name: Home Turf Advantage
text:
Bring 2 battlefields to the game.
During setup, if your battlefield would be chosen for the game, you choose one of your 2 battlefields instead. Set the other one aside.
label: Home Turf Advantage

name: Ammo Reserves
text: After you play this support, place 3 damage on it. Action - Exhaust this support and remove 1 damage from it to deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
label: Ammo Reserves

name: ARC-170 Starfighter
text: Before this support is discarded from play, you may return it to its owner's hand.
flavor: This Aggressive ReConnaissance-170 starfighter was both armed for battle and equipped for deep-space travel.
label: ARC-170 Starfighter

name: Hailfire Droid Tank
text: After you play a vehicle (including this support), you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. After you play a droid (including this support), you may activate it.
label: Hailfire Droid Tank

name: Weapon Master
text: Action - Remove one of attached character's character or upgrade dice to turn one of its weapon dice to any side.
label: Weapon Master

name: Friend or Foe
text: Reroll a character die. Then, if it just rolled damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), deal 1 damage to that character. Otherwise, give it 1 shield.
label: Friend or Foe

name: In The Crosshairs
text:
Ambush.
Choose a symbol. Then remove any number of dice showing that symbol.
label: In The Crosshairs

name: Podracer Betting
text: Choose a number. Then reroll one of your vehicle dice. If that die just rolled a value equal to the number you chose, gain 2 resources, or 3 resources instead if it was a podracer die.
label: Podracer Betting

name: Reprogram
text: Choose a droid from your hand and play it, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Reprogram

name: Risky Move
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove a die. The next card an opponent plays this round has the Ambush keyword.
label: Risky Move

name: Start Your Engines!
text: Search your deck for a podracer, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Start Your Engines!

name: Calling in Favors
text: Before you play an event that costs 3 or more, you may exhaust this plot to decrease its cost by 1, or by 2 instead if you have exactly one character in play.
label: Calling in Favors

name: Prized Goods
text: Action - Exhaust this support and one of your characters to place 3 resources on this support or to take all resources from it.
label: Prized Goods

name: Streetwise
text: Before you play a Yellow event, you may exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.
label: Streetwise

name: XS Stock Light Freighter
text:
Ambush.
[special] - Place 2 resources on this support or take all resources from it. You may take one additional action.
label: XS Stock Light Freighter

name: Darksaber
text:
Redeploy.
Before you resolve this die, increase its value by 1 if attached character is 15 or more points, or by 2 instead if attached character is 20 or more points.
label: Darksaber

name: Mandalorian Vambraces
text: Action - Return this upgrade from play to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Try them on, Grappling line, paralyzing darts, repulsor. All designed to combat the abilities of the Jedi". <cite>Fenn Rau</cite>
label: Mandalorian Vambraces

name: Respected Businessman
text: After you activate attached character, you may gain 1 resource.
flavor: "As my sweet mother always said, 'Son, if one hostage is good, two is better. And three, well, that's good business.'" <cite>Hondo Ohnaka</cite>
label: Respected Businessman

name: V-1 Thermal Detonator
text: [special] - Discard this upgrade from play to deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
label: V-1 Thermal Detonator

name: Extract
text: Choose up to 3 cards in a discard pile and set them aside.
label: Extract

name: Free Fall
text:
Ambush.
Force an opponent to remove one of their dice.
label: Free Fall

name: Made to Suffer
text: Each player discards cards from the top of their deck equal to the number of their dice showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Made to Suffer

name: Nature's Charm
text: Reroll up to 2 dice (yours and/or an opponent's).
label: Nature's Charm

name: Quell
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing indirect damage ([indirect]).
label: Quell

name: Under Attack
text: Remove any number of an opponent's dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself equal to the combined value showing on those dice.
label: Under Attack

name: Lotho Minor Junkers
text: [special] - Set aside a droid, equipment, vehicle, or weapon in your discard pile to gain 2 resources.
label: Lotho Minor Junkers

name: Podracer
text:
Ambush.
After this die rolls a blank ([blank]), return this support from play to its owner's hand.
label: Podracer

name: Macrobinoculars
text: [special] - Look at an opponent's hand. Give a character 1 shield.
label: Macrobinoculars

name: Boonta Eve Classic
text: After you resolve one of your podracer dice, you may place 1 resource on that podracer. If there are 4 or more resources on it, set each copy of this plot aside and gain 4 resources.
label: Boonta Eve Classic

name: Arena of Death
subtitle: Nar Shaddaa
text: Claim - Deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of defeated characters you have, to a maximum of 3.
label: Arena of Death - Nar Shaddaa

name: Bendu's Lair
subtitle: Atollon
text: Power Action - Roll this die into your pool. After you take control of this battlefield, remove its die.
label: Bendu's Lair - Atollon

name: Comm Tower
subtitle: Scarif
text: Claim - Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1 if you spot a plot.
label: Comm Tower - Scarif

name: Mos Espa Arena
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Force an opponent to choose to either lose 1 resource or have you gain 1 resource. Spot a podracer to force them to do both instead.
label: Mos Espa Arena - Tatooine

name: Rift Valley
subtitle: Dathomir
text: Claim - Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card's cost is an odd number, remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.
label: Rift Valley - Dathomir
